channel.title: A java exception has occurred. Any help appreciated!
channel.description: Hey guys, when I jar my client, then run it, it works like a dream! But then I go onto another computer, or have a friend try it, and they get "A java exception has occurred." How do I fix this? What am I doing wrong? I can't for the life of me find the solution to this. I googled it and found nothing, but I did find this picture, this is exactly what pops up on other peoples ends. My end opens the client just fine. I also have signed the jar. So I am not sure what to do....

item.title: A java exception has occurred. Any help appreciated!
